document_name: “Green Growth Strategy Through Achieving Carbon Neutrality in 2050” Formulated
document_description: This document is an industrial policy which aims to create a positive cycle of economic growth and environmental protection. It seeks to set ambitious goals and fully support the private sector’s efforts toward carbon neutrality by 2050.  The strategy includes 5 cross sectoral policy tools (support measures) and action plans for 14 sectors, and will be updated continuously.
